title: CPUP hosts 40+ applications to competitive FCT funding opportunities in 2023
description: The center is supporting 11 applications to the 6th Edition of the CEEC Call, 3 researchers applying to the RESTART Program, and 29 applicants to Ph.D. Studentships. We wish success to all the applicants!

title: The Play-the-Odds Project encourages families to talk about the risk of hereditary cancer and rare deseases
description: The projetc tries to answer to a demand pointed about by families and health professionals, namely, preparing families to reveal an hereditary cancer syndrome in the familiy to their children. The goal is to develop a prototype digital tool for genetic counseling to communicate about the risk of hereditary cancer. The Play-the-Odds Project is sponsored by FCT (EXPL/PSI-GER/1270/2021).
